title: "Hackensack Meridian Health and Google Expand Relationship to Improve Patient Care"
excerpt: "Hackensack Meridian Health and Google today announced the two organizations are expanding their relationship to improve patient care. Hackensack Meridian Health recently migrated to Google Workspace and will be one of the first health systems in the world to use Chrome OS devices across clinical and business environments."
